title: Hegseth Speaks at Reagan National Defense Forum
description: United States Secretary of War Pete Hegseth spoke at the Reagan National Defense Forum saying president Trump can take "decisive military action as he sees fit." (Source: Bloomberg)
content: United States Secretary of War Pete Hegseth spoke at the Reagan National Defense Forum saying president Trump can take "decisive military action as he sees fit." (Source: Bloomberg)
